Articles.Content:
Hi Guys My name is Andrew and i am 23 years old. A friend recommended this game to me so i decided to try it out can anyone give me some tips to building really big but efficient things,it would really be helpful. I also want to say hi to the Administrators of this game(If there are any).Well i look fowerd to playing this game.

Thank you for your time,

PhoinexFlyer

Welcome to the community Andrew

There's many players here who can help, and it's a good idea to check out the Gameplay section and the Spacecraft Exchange for examples of craft.

Also you can let the developers know how much you love KSP here.

Have fun on the forums and fly safe !
Hello hope you have a good time here at the forums!

Welcome aboard! A good place to begin making efficient designs is a little old thing by the name of Asparagus Staging. It uses fuel lines to feed a series of boosters in a sequence, and drops off empty fuel tanks/engines when they are no longer needed. I think you should definitely dig into that a little bit.
Welcome aboard! Enjoy your stay here
